list_definition.definition: a person who is in front or goes first

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The fourth runner is several miles behind the leaders.

list_definition.definition: a person who is the head of, organizes or is in charge (of something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The leader of the expedition is a scientist.

list_definition.definition: an article in a newspaper etc written to express the opinions of the editor

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He used the leader to criticize the government’s immigration policy.

list_ex_of_english: We thought it wise to elect leaders in different places.
